DESCRIPTION.P: Scicos compiled diagram data structure contains all information needed to simulate the system (see scicosim).

ITEMIZE.label: DEFINITION

ITEM.label: cpr: Scilab tlist (called %cpr by default), Scicos compiled

ITEMIZE.ITEM: diagram data structure defined by the formal name 'cpr' and containing the following fields:

ITEMIZE.label: FIELDS
ITEMIZE.ITEM: : Scilab tlist contains initial state (see scicos_state).
: Scilab tlist. Usually generated by Scicos Compile menu (see scicos_sim).
: is a list with same recursive structure as scs_m each leaf contains the index of associated block in cpr data structure.
: corinv(i) is the path of i th block defined in cpr data structure in the scs_m data structure.
